Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25

Issue: when I have the RSS folder from Better Atmospheres and Hyperedit in GameData at the same time, the game always seems to crash.

Notes: I'm pretty sure that this is NOT an out of memory error. It happens every time I put them together, regardless of the mods

Error Log: http://pastebin.com/BBrMyfaD

Edited November 1, 2014 by TheJewelOfJool

Sorry, we do indeed need more information than that. Please follow the guidelines in the How To Get Support sticky.

My guess is you're running out of memory (Better Atmospheres takes a lot of RAM) but to confirm, we need more info.
I've added the Error Log to the first post.
That's not what the sticky tells you to add, and that's not what we need. Please follow the guidelines in the How To Get Support sticky.
I give up. I'll fix it myself.

• Windows: KSP_win\KSP_Data\output_log.txt (32bit) or KSP_win64\KSP_x64_Data\output_log.txt (64bit)
  • Mac OS X: Open Console, on the left side of the window there is a menu that says 'files'. Scroll down the list and find the Unity drop down, under Unity there will be Player.log ( Files>~/Library/Logs>Unity>Player.log )
  • Linux: ~/.config/unity3d/Squad/Kerbal\ Space\ Program/Player.log

I'd say that's pretty straightforward.
UPDATE: I installed Active Texture Managment, and It's working fine now.

My guess is you're running out of memory (Better Atmospheres takes a lot of RAM) but to confirm, we need more info.

Emphasis added.

Glad you've got it working!
